content: अपरिग्रह {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Without possessions or belongings, attendants &c; quite destitute, as in निराशीरपरिग्रहः --हः {@--1@} Non-acceptance, rejection, renunciation, one of the several kinds of {%yamas%} (mental restraints) stated in Yoga Śāstra by Patañjali. {@--2@} Destitution, poverty.
